headline: Is Aptiv (APTV) Still Attractively Priced After A 42% One Year Share Price Rebound
summary: If you are wondering whether Aptiv's current share price still offers value after a strong run, this article will walk through what the numbers actually say about the stock. The share price closed at US$86.45, with returns of 13.6% over the last 7 days, 13.2% over 30 days, 10.2% year to date and 42.2% over the last year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns are 15.0% and 40.1% declines. Recent coverage around Aptiv has mainly focused on how investors are reassessing companies tied to...
